member.name: M:Ship.Ses.Extractor.Presentation.Api.Controllers.v1.MappingsController.GetResourceTypes
member.summary: Retrieves all supported FHIR resource types.

member.name: M:Ship.Ses.Extractor.Presentation.Api.Controllers.v1.MappingsController.GetMapping(System.Guid)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific mapping by its ID.

member.name: M:Ship.Ses.Extractor.Presentation.Api.Controllers.v1.MappingsController.GetMappingsByResourceType(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves mappings associated with a specific FHIR resource type.

member.param: The unique identifier of the mapping to update.
member.returns: No content if the update is successful.

member.name: M:Ship.Ses.Extractor.Presentation.Api.Controllers.v1.MappingsController.DeleteMapping(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes a mapping definition by its unique identifier.
